audioJson.name: DC-International
audioJson.capacity:
DC-60: 30 minutes (per side)
DC-90: 45 minutes (per side)
DC-120: 60 minutes (per side)
audioJson.fact1: After just two years, this format was discontinued in favor of the Compact Cassette
audioJson.fact2: DC is short for double cassette because it was a two-reel cassette
audioJson.fact3: This format could enable write protection by putting an insert into a recess in the base of the cassette
